class.name: Space

javadoc.text: This interface represents a generic space, with affine and vectorial counterparts.
Get the dimension of the space.
Get the n-1 dimension subspace of this space.
javadoc.return: n-1 dimension sub-space of this space
javadoc.exception: MathUnsupportedOperationException for dimension-1 spaces * which do not have sub-spaces
